definition: to peel with a knife/to pare/to cut (a ball at tennis etc)
to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

sentences.english: The man first cut the tree down and then cut it up.
sentences.chinese: 那人先把樹砍，然後將其削減了。

sentences.english: Glaxo To Cut US Sales Reps For Avandia?
sentences.chinese: 葛蘭素可能削減美國的文迪雅銷售代表？

sentences.english: Again, I'm not opposed to long-term deficit reduction, so long as it's equitable.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，我不反對長期削減赤字，只要它的公平。

sentences.english: Politicians are reluctant to cut taxes, but they do it gradually.
sentences.chinese: 政客們雖不願削減稅費，但還是逐漸地那麼做了。

sentences.english: First, I cut an access hole in the Bridge Deck and glued the Wheelhouse to it.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我削減一進入洞，在橋面和膠合板舵手給它。

sentences.english: Other ways to whittle down banks are thinkable.
sentences.chinese: 另外一些削減銀行的辦法是值得考慮的。

sentences.english: To reverse the " decline " in sales of Sable, and Mercury are also great to cut costs.
sentences.chinese: 扭轉銷售下降的紫貂，水星也主要成本削減。

sentences.english: Letting tax cheats run wild doesn’t exactly serve the cause of deficit reduction.
sentences.chinese: 讓騙稅氾濫與削減赤字的努力作用剛好相反。

sentences.english: The other countries must therefore find further cuts of 2.6bn tonnes.
sentences.chinese: 其他國家就必須設法再削減26億噸。

sentences.english: Cut the dowel down to 20cm in length.
sentences.chinese: 削減木釘，以20釐米的長度。

sentences.english: All their instincts are to cut services for people at the bottom and the middle.
sentences.chinese: 他們的所有本能是削減底層和中層人民的服務。

sentences.english: Any company that cuts back on research and development is killing the goose that lays the golden egg.
sentences.chinese: 那些削減科研費用的公司，等於是在殺雞取卵。

sentences.english: Formally the house seeks to be a solid with the least possible subtractions.
sentences.chinese: 形式上別墅力圖成爲一個削減最少的立方體。

sentences.english: But serving a new sport means cutting back on his traditional surf stores.
sentences.chinese: 但是，爲一項新的運動方式削減他的傳統衝浪店。

sentences.english: But that compromises the artistic side of climbing.
sentences.chinese: 但是這種行爲削減了攀爬的藝術性。
削減成本的舉措已經在進行。

definition: expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
to adjust downwards/to lower (prices, wages etc)
to demote/to pass down to a lower unit
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
to utilize/to put sth to use
